data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Discozerconidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from carabid beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae) in New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seeman, Owen D., Baker, Michelle R. (2013): A new genus and species of Discozerconidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from carabid beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae) in New Zealand. Zootaxa 3750 (2): 130-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.2.2
